query:
UPDATE votes SET value = $1
                        WHERE
                            vote_id = $2 AND
                            post_id = $3 AND
                            comment_id IS NOT DISTINCT FROM $4 AND
                            user_id = $5 AND
                            NOT EXISTS (
                                SELECT * FROM user_bans b
                                JOIN spheres s ON s.sphere_id = b.sphere_id
                                JOIN posts p ON p.sphere_id = s.sphere_id
                                WHERE p.post_id = $3 AND b.user_id = $5
                            )
                        RETURNING *
